Text.val: 13.01.2009 GB SCR14278 Changed calculation PAYCR, MUTCR
06.11.2008 AS SCR14085 additional parameter GM102 pi.batch_processing
18.07.2008 SH SCR13794 Added column "Current investment" and changed calculation
13.06.2008 Gb SCR13722 Changed condition for test on month
15.04.2008 SH SCR13517 Added test on moth (1,4,7,10) to create lists; Changed
-- If BPQ013 is started with PI.DATE = blank/0, then the program must only

ExpSyntax.val: IF (Trim ({0,1})<>'','TRUE'LOG,IF (Month ({0,2})=3 OR Month ({0,2})=6 OR Month ({0,2})=9 OR Month ({0,2})=12,'TRUE'LOG,'FALSE'LOG))

SQL_STMT_U.val: select CLNT.CLNT101_ADMNO, CLNT.CLNT102_CLNTNO, CLNT.CLNT104_LEGAL_ADMNO, CLNT.CLNT104_LEGAL_CLNTNO, CLNT.CLNT906_STATUSCONTRACT, CLNT.CLNT804_SME_CODE, ADMN.ADMN_DELCREDERE, ADMN.ADMN_ENDCLIENTS, CLNT.CLNT402_ADVANCE, CLNT.CLNT208_HGROUP, CLNT.CLNT110_NAME1 from :1/CLNT CLNT, :1/ADMN ADMN , :1/SECR SECR where SECR.SECR_ADMNO = CLNT.CLNT101_ADMNO and SECR.SECR_CLNTNO = CLNT.CLNT102_CLNTNO and CLNT.CLNT104_LEGAL_ADMNO = ADMN.ADMN_NO and CLNT.CLNT101_ADMNO = CLNT104_LEGAL_ADMNO and CLNT.CLNT102_CLNTNO = CLNT104_LEGAL_CLNTNO and CLNT.CLNT906_STATUSCONTRACT = 1 and CLNT.CLNT208_HGROUP <> '400' and CLNT.CLNT208_HGROUP <> '600' and ADMN.ADMN_DELCREDERE = 'N' and ADMN.ADMN_ENDCLIENTS = 'N' and SECR.SECR_DATE_RELEASE_SD is not null and SECR.SECR_DATE_RELEASE_SD < ':2' order by CLNT.CLNT104_LEGAL_ADMNO, CLNT.CLNT104_LEGAL_CLNTNO

ExpSyntax.val: MlsTrans ('Admno Legal')&';'&MlsTrans ('Clientno Legal')&';'&MlsTrans ('Name')&';'&MlsTrans ('ICF group')&';'&MlsTrans ('Risk rating ')&';'&MlsTrans ('Liquidation Ratio YTD')&';'&MlsTrans ('Advance %')&';'&MlsTrans ('Current Investment')

SQL_STMT_U.val: select CLNT.CLNT101_ADMNO, CLNT.CLNT102_CLNTNO from :1/CLNT CLNT where CLNT.CLNT906_STATUSCONTRACT = 1 and CLNT.CLNT104_LEGAL_ADMNO = :2 and CLNT.CLNT104_LEGAL_CLNTNO = :3

select cast (sum (CDTO.CDTO_CURRBALDEBTORS) as decimal (13,2)), cast (sum (CDTO.CDTO_CURRBALINVESTMENT) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/CDTO CDTO where CDTO.CDTO_ADMNO = :2 and CDTO.CDTO_CLNTNO = :3 and CDTO.CDTO_DATE = ':4' for fetch only

select cast (sum (CDTO.CDTO_LIQRATIO1) as decimal (13,2)), cast (sum (CDTO.CDTO_LIQRATIO2) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/CDTO CDTO where CDTO.CDTO_ADMNO = :2 and CDTO.CDTO_CLNTNO = :3 and CDTO.CDTO_DATE between ':4' and ':5' for fetch only

select CDTO_DATE, cast (sum (CDTO_CURRBALSETTLEMENTACC - CDTO_CURRBALOVERDRAWINGS) as decimal (13,2)) from :1/CDTO, :1/CLNT where CLNT906_STATUSCONTRACT = 1 and CLNT104_LEGAL_ADMNO = :2 and CLNT104_LEGAL_CLNTNO = :3 and CDTO_ADMNO = CLNT101_ADMNO and CDTO_CLNTNO = CLNT102_CLNTNO and CDTO_DATE between ':4' and ':5' group by CDTO_DATE order by CDTO_DATE for fetch only
